title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

Kenneth W. Way of North Granby, Connecticut, sent us an advertisement from the Heartland America catalog of May 2003. It shows a device that permits one to “Know the Time To One MIllionth Of A Second Plus Outdoor Temperature!” Mr. Way explains that this “must be directed toward a select group who love mathematical puzzles.”
